name: MICROFLITE PTY. LTD.
about: Microflite PTY. LTD. is Victoriaâ€™s premier helicopter and fixed-wing charter company, offering a premium range of services including helicopter rides, tours, charter flights, airwork applications, and pilot training. As a family-owned business, Microflite prides itself on high standards of safety and comfort, with a versatile fleet of 23 aircraft, including Airbus and Bell helicopters, and fixed-wing aircraft like the Pilatus PC-12. Our highly-trained pilots are certified to fly in all conditions, ensuring safety and excellence in every operation. With luxury departure lounges in Melbourne CBD and Moorabbin Airport, Microflite provides bespoke travel and critical services support Australia-wide, adhering to the highest standards in every aspect of our business. Your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities.
